add_labels_to_issue.description: Adds labels to an existing issue.

create_branch.description: Creates a new branch on a repository.

props.name: new_branch_name
props.description: The name for the new branch (e.g., 'feature/new-design').

createCommentOnAIssue.description: Adds a comment to the specified issue (also works with pull requests)

props.name: issue_number
props.description: The number of the issue to comment on

props.name: comment
props.description: The comment to add to the issue

github_create_commit_comment.description: Creates a comment on a commit in a GitHub repository

props.name: sha
props.description: The SHA of the commit to comment on

props.name: body
props.description: The content of the comment

props.name: path
props.description: The relative path to the file to comment on (optional)

props.name: position
props.description: The line index in the diff to comment on (optional)

github_create_discussion_comment.description: Creates a comment on a discussion in a GitHub repository

props.name: discussion_number
props.description: The number of the discussion to comment on

props.name: body
props.description: The content of the comment (supports markdown)

props.name: title
props.description: The title of the issue

props.name: description
props.description: The description of the issue

github_create_pull_request_review_commen.description: Creates a review comment on a pull request in a GitHub repository

props.name: pull_number
props.description: The number of the pull request

props.name: commit_id
props.description: The SHA of the commit to comment on

props.name: path
props.description: The relative path to the file to comment on

props.name: body
props.description: The content of the review comment

props.name: position
props.description: The position in the diff where the comment should be placed

delete_branch.description: Deletes a branch from a repository.

find_branch.description: Finds a branch by name and returns its details.

props.name: state
props.description: Filter issues by their state.

find_user.description: Finds a user by their login name.

props.name: username
props.description: The GitHub username (login) to look up.

getIssueInformation.description: Grabs information from a specific issue

props.name: issue_number
props.description: The number of the issue you want to get information from

props.name: issue_number
props.description: The number of the issue to be locked

props.name: issue_number
props.description: The number of the issue to be unlocked

props.name: state
props.description: The new state of the issue.

props.name: state_reason
props.description: The reason for the state change. (Only used if State is changed).
